snippet: C.C. Sabathia was home Monday in Vallejo, Calif., to help dedicate the basketball courts that he had refurbished in honor of his cousin Demetrius Davis, who died in December.
abstract: C.C. Sabathia was home Monday in Vallejo, Calif., to help dedicate the basketball courts that he had refurbished in honor of his cousin Demetrius Davis, who died in December.

headline.main: Sabathia Does Something Special for His Cousin
